```shell
npx hardhat deploy

# create Avatar NFT
npx hardhat createRarement <FILE_NAME> --avatar-id <AVATAR_ID>

# create Collectible NFT
npx hardhat createRarement <FILE_NAME> --collectible-id <COLLECTIBLE_ID>

# verify
npx hardhat verify <RAREMENT_CREATOR_ADDRESS> <BEACON_ADDRESS>
0x8139b4e9                                                        <FUNC_SIG_ID>
```
